item.title: 2012 Ford Transit Connect
item.description: Make Ford Model Transit Connect Year 2012 Why I chose this van compact It is the length of a Toyota Prius, so can fit in a city spot.

item.title: Mars College
item.description: Mars College is a high-tech low-cost art residency in the desert by the Salton Sea in California. It takes place January through March.

item.title: re-entering nomadicism
item.description: Periodic living - moving and staying, then moving and returning. Present State January of 2023, I quit a full time job and moved out of an apartment.

item.title: Just Make Work
item.description: Work - in this note I refer to art, projects, ideas, as work. The desire to do good work comes from some idea of what good work is.

item.title: Make bagels in the desert
item.description: I use this bagel recipe: [[recipes/bagels|bagels]] Februrary 2023, at Mars College. Kif and myself few decide to build a wood-fired oven in the desert.

item.title: Sidebar in Quartz
item.description: Background Quartz is a project based on Hugo (static site generator) to make deploying Obsidian (markdown note app) files easy.

item.title: Yes I'm an addict
item.description: To recover I must admit: I am an addict. Specifically, content on screens. Instagram is a vice, and so is online pornography.
